name: Manual Clone Calibration
question: Does a manual git clone from a local machine produce exactly +1 clone, +1 unique?

hypothesis.reasoning: A human git clone should be unambiguous: 1 clone, 1 unique (different identity from CI bot). This validates the measurement system end-to-end with a known signal.

actions.notes: git clone https://github.com/djdarcy/gtt-ci-clone-testbed.git /tmp/cal — then delete. No workflow triggers.

results.notes: Calibration experiment — no CI activity. All formulas agree on 0 CI clones. Tests that the measurement system detects a known human clone.
